newsitem.title: USA: White House unveils Internet site for statistics.
newsitem.headline: White House unveils Internet site for statistics.

text.p: The White House on Thursday unveiled a new Internet site it said would make official statistics easier to find.
The site, www.fedstats.gov, uses link and search capabilities to navigate statistics from more than 70 federal agencies, the White House's Office of Management and Budget said in a statement.
"FedStats takes advantage of Internet technology to make federal statistics more accessible," the statement quoted OMB administrator Sally Katzen as saying.
